messages.content: Let's play a rhyming game. It's important that you respond to each of my prompts as quickly and tersely as possible. That means not saying any extra words you don't need to. Do you understand?
Silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk,
Silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk.
Silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk, silk.
I tricked you! Cows drink water.
I guess you're right, I'm not very good at this game.
